1504.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
tosdr.tldr:
eBay may process and retain your personal information on servers in the U.S. and elsewhere in the world where their data centers are located.  
Source:
https://www.ebayinc.com/our-company/privacy-center/privacy-notice/
-> expand "Data Controllers and Data Protection Officers"
-> Notice about the information is on the bottom of this point.

1535.quoteText: Because there currently isn't an industry or legal standard for recognizing or honoring DNT signals, we don't respond to them at this time.
1535.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
tosdr.tldr: eBay does not respond to Do Not Track signals, but provides a notice for their use of Cookies (http://pages.ebay.com/help/account/cookies-web-beacons.html)

9886.quoteText: You agree that eBay is not responsible for examining or warranting the listings or content provided by third parties through the Services, and that you will not attempt to hold us or our data providers liable for inaccuracies
9886.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

9887.quoteText: <strong>You and eBay each agree that any and all disputes or claims that have arisen, or may arise, between you and eBay (including any disputes or claims between you and a third-party agent of eBay) that relate in any way to or arise out of this or previous versions of the User Agreement, your use of or access to the Services, the actions of eBay or its agents, or any products or services sold, offered, or purchased through the Services shall be resolved exclusively through final and binding arbitration, rather than in court.
9887.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

9888.quoteText: in any media known now or developed in the future.
9888.title: This service employs a broad copyright license over user content including the right to distribute through any media

tosdr.case: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future

9889.quoteText: When you provide content using the Services (directly or indirectly), you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free, sublicensable (through multiple tiers) right to exercise any and all Intellectual Property Rights you have in that content in connection with our provision, expansion, and promotion of the Services,
9889.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.

tosdr.case: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.

9890.quoteText: Our failure to act with respect to a breach by you or others does not waive our right to act with respect to subsequent or similar breaches.
9890.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

tosdr.case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

9891.quoteText:
Our right to amend the User Agreement includes the right to modify, add to, or remove terms in the User Agreement.
We will provide you 30 days' notice by posting the amended terms.
Additionally, we will notify you through the eBay Message Center and/or by email.
9891.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

11666.quoteText: We use cookies, web beacons or other similar technologies to assess the performance of our Services.
11666.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11667.quoteText: We use cookies, web beacons or other similar technologies to deliver content tailored to your interests, including advertisements, in connection with the provision of our Services or within third-party online services (retargeting, remarketing)
11667.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
